short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CTV Screen Sharing allows you share screens, along with chat, files, and webcams/microphones.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share screen of any application or entire screen or screen of any chrome tab. It is private, full-HD screen sharing.
